body: Ah! This is a returning issue. [Here](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/xn/detail/2985220:Comment:1345947) and [here](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topics/honeybee-solve-adjacencies-error?commentId=2985220%3AComment%3A1287860&groupId=2985220%3AGroup%3A658987) are just two examples and we should have fixed it sooner. There is a check for zones with the same name that should catch cases like this but for some reason it doesn't always work. As a temporary fix I added a warning to the component and it won't run if there are duplicate names.
